Flyman's Blog

Curious about different technologies

DeepLearning4J seems like a pretty interesting project and I just gave a shot and made a simple digit recognition Android app. Here are some useful resources I found:

  1. It talks about how to open an existing project from DeepLearning4J examples.
  2. It shows the example of MNIST. Following this example, you can train the neural network.
  3. How to save/read model
  4. It has an example of how to train the model in Android. I did not train the model in Android, since it is time- and resource-consuming. I pretrained the model in my desktop and then copied it to Android phone. After that, loading the model from the app, and predict the digit.

The Android app is here. The model is put here.
